title: Electric mobility startup Vidyut launches offline pre-owned EV sales, financing platform
description: Vidyut has launched an offline pre-owned EV platform in Delhi-NCR, Hyderabad, and Bengaluru, with plans to expand. An online marketplace is coming in six months. They handle the full process, reselling EVs from major brands. Their battery subscription model and financing services tackle EV adoption challenges. Vidyut, started in November 2021, aims to improve EV accessibility.
